//EUREKA ......IT'S MY 100TH QUESTION ON CODE CHEF ..... :)
#include <stdio.h>
long long hash[1000005]={0};
int main(void)
{	//your code goes here
    long long n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    int t,max=-11101,i;
    long long sum=(n*(n-1))/2; //total sum
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&t);
        if(t>max)  //to get the maximum
            max=t;
        hash[t]++;
    }
    for(i=0;i<1000005;i++) //hash lookup
    {
        if(hash[i]>1)
            sum-=((hash[i]-1)*hash[i])/2; //getting the answer
    }
    printf("%llu\n",sum);
    return 0;
}
